languages.text: "Два десятка лет я служил ей и, до вашего назначения, не знал иного Лорд-капитана. С ней я прошел через..." {n}Астропат умолкает, будто мыслями ненадолго переместился в другое место. На его лицо набегает тень сожаления.{/n} "...многое".

traits.locale_text: "После выпуска из Схоластика псайкана, Леди Теодора фон Валанциус была первой и единственной, кому мне довелось служить. Не считая, конечно же, вас, Ваша Светлость. Я обретаюсь на этом корабле уже два десятка лет. Мы с Теодорой прошли через..." {n}Лицо астропата обращено к вам, но мыслями он будто ненадолго переместился в другое место. Его лицо трогает почти незаметная тень сожаления.{/n} "Через многое".

languages.text: "I served her for two decades, and never knew another Lord Captain before your ascension. With her, I had been through..." {n}The Choirmaster falls silent, as though briefly transported in his mind to another place. A shadow of regret creeps onto his face.{/n} "...many things."
languages.original_text: "Два десятка лет я служил ей и, до вашего назначения, не знал иного Лорд-капитана. С ней я прошел через..." {n}Астропат умолкает, будто мыслями ненадолго переместился в другое место. На его лицо набегает тень сожаления.{/n} "...многое".

traits.locale_text: "I served her for two decades, and never knew another Lord Captain before your ascension. With her, I had been through—" {n}The astropath falls silent, as though briefly transported in his mind to another place. A shadow of regret creeps onto his face.{/n} "—a lot."

"I served her for two decades, and never knew another Lord Captain before your ascension. With her, I had been through—" {n}The astropath falls silent, as though briefly transported in his mind to another place. A shadow of regret creeps onto his face.{/n} "—a lot."

"I served her for two decades, and never knew another Lord Captain before your ascension. With her, I had been through—" {n}The astropath falls silent, as though briefly transported in his mind to another place. A shadow of regret creeps onto his face.{/n} "—a lot."

"I served her for two decades, and never knew another Lord Captain before your ascension. With her, I had been through..." {n}The Choirmaster falls silent, as though briefly transported in his mind to another place. A shadow of regret creeps onto his face.{/n} "...many things."

"I served her for two decades, and never knew another Lord Captain before your ascension. With her, I had been through..." {n}The Choirmaster falls silent, as though briefly transported in his mind to another place. A shadow of regret creeps onto his face.{/n} "...many things."

languages.text: «La serví durante dos décadas y no había conocido a otro Lord Capitán hasta su ascensión. Junto a ella viví...». {n}El maestro del Coro guarda silencio, como si su mente hubiera viajado a un lugar distante. La sombra del arrepentimiento se hace visible en su rostro.{/n} «... muchas cosas».
languages.original_text: "I served her for two decades, and never knew another Lord Captain before your ascension. With her, I had been through..." {n}The Choirmaster falls silent, as though briefly transported in his mind to another place. A shadow of regret creeps onto his face.{/n} "...many things."

traits.locale_text: «La serví durante dos décadas y no había conocido a otro Lord Capitán hasta su ascensión. Junto a ella viví...». {n}El maestro del Coro guarda silencio, como si su mente hubiera viajado a un lugar distante. La sombra del arrepentimiento se hace visible en su rostro.{/n} «... muchas cosas».

languages.text: 「20年間シオドーラ様に仕えたが、あなたが就任するまで、他のロード・キャプテンを知ることはなかった。彼女とともに、私は…」{n}クワイアーマスターは、まるで一瞬、別の場所に魂が行ってしまったかのように口を閉ざした。男の顔に後悔の影が差す。{/n}「…たくさんのことを経験した」
languages.original_text: "I served her for two decades, and never knew another Lord Captain before your ascension. With her, I had been through..." {n}The Choirmaster falls silent, as though briefly transported in his mind to another place. A shadow of regret creeps onto his face.{/n} "...many things."

traits.locale_text: 「20年間シオドーラ様に仕えたが、あなたが就任するまで、他のロード・キャプテンを知ることはなかった。彼女とともに、私は…」{n}クワイアーマスターは、まるで一瞬、別の場所に魂が行ってしまったかのように口を閉ざした。男の顔に後悔の影が差す。{/n}「…たくさんのことを経験した」

languages.text: “我侍奉了她二十年，直到您继任之前，我从来没见过其他领主舰长。服侍她的日子里，我经历了……”{n}唱诗大师沉默不语，仿佛出神一般，悔恨的阴影爬上了他的面容。{/n}“……很多事情。”
languages.original_text: "I served her for two decades, and never knew another Lord Captain before your ascension. With her, I had been through..." {n}The Choirmaster falls silent, as though briefly transported in his mind to another place. A shadow of regret creeps onto his face.{/n} "...many things."

traits.locale_text: “我侍奉了她二十年，直到您继任之前，我从来没见过其他领主舰长。服侍她的日子里，我经历了……”{n}唱诗大师沉默不语，仿佛出神一般，悔恨的阴影爬上了他的面容。{/n}“……很多事情。”

languages.text: "Ich habe ihr zwei Jahrzehnte lang gedient und kannte vor Eurem Aufstieg nie einen anderen Lord Captain. Mit ihr habe ich"{n}, der Chormeister verstummt, als würde er in Gedanken kurz an einen anderen Ort transportiert werden, dann legt sich ein Schatten der Reue auf seine Miene,{/n} "vieles erlebt".
languages.original_text: "I served her for two decades, and never knew another Lord Captain before your ascension. With her, I had been through..." {n}The Choirmaster falls silent, as though briefly transported in his mind to another place. A shadow of regret creeps onto his face.{/n} "...many things."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe ihr zwei Jahrzehnte lang gedient und kannte vor Eurem Aufstieg nie einen anderen Lord Captain. Mit ihr habe ich"{n}, der Chormeister verstummt, als würde er in Gedanken kurz an einen anderen Ort transportiert werden, dann legt sich ein Schatten der Reue auf seine Miene,{/n} "vieles erlebt".

languages.text: « Je l'ai servie deux décennies durant, et je n'avais jamais connu d'autre seigneur-capitaine avant votre ascension. Avec elle, j'en suis passé par... » {n}Le maître de chœur s'interrompt, comme si le fil de ses pensées l'avait brièvement transporté en un tout autre lieu. L'ombre d'un regret se dessine sur son visage.{/n} « ... bien des épreuves. »
languages.original_text: "I served her for two decades, and never knew another Lord Captain before your ascension. With her, I had been through..." {n}The Choirmaster falls silent, as though briefly transported in his mind to another place. A shadow of regret creeps onto his face.{/n} "...many things."

traits.locale_text: « Je l'ai servie deux décennies durant, et je n'avais jamais connu d'autre seigneur-capitaine avant votre ascension. Avec elle, j'en suis passé par... » {n}Le maître de chœur s'interrompt, comme si le fil de ses pensées l'avait brièvement transporté en un tout autre lieu. L'ombre d'un regret se dessine sur son visage.{/n} « ... bien des épreuves. »

languages.text: "Ona yirmi yıl kadar hizmet ettim ve sizin göreve gelişinize dek başka bir Lord Kaptan tanımadım. Onun emrinde pek çok..." {n}Koro Şefi, zihni başka bir yere gitmişçesine sükûnete bürünüyor. Pişmanlığın gölgesi, yüzüne sinsice hâkim oluyor.{/n} "... Şey yaşadım."
languages.original_text: "I served her for two decades, and never knew another Lord Captain before your ascension. With her, I had been through..." {n}The Choirmaster falls silent, as though briefly transported in his mind to another place. A shadow of regret creeps onto his face.{/n} "...many things."
